attributes.action: PLC to disclose the outsourced staff count (jobs moved offshore)
attributes.additional_details:
We British public wants legislation to make it mandatory for PLC ( public limited company) disclose the actual count of jobs moved offshore. This will allow public to take better decisions as to support companies who invest in British society and hire workers in Britian.
As of now, people cannot compare among companies which is better in supporting British workforce and hence fail in taking the right decision.

Government should bring in legislation to make companies disclose this information.
